content: New two hour episode on a subject I already obsessively keep up to date with on zulip? Don't mind if I do!
Long time elixir user so I'm definitely biased, but I love how you can hear José process new information and weight the language impact in real time.
loved the episode. could listen to Richard and José talk for hours more!
I have a ~2 hour conversation with Jonathan Blow recorded, where we talk about his language design philosophy. It's very different, and very interesting!
only one question: when?! I waited for this crossover too long!
it's been sent to the editor but there are a few episodes in the queue ahead of it (one with Gleam creator, another about Lean 4)

there are also a couple of episodes in my backlog that keep getting bumped for other things that I feel bad about not having shipped yet because at this point they were recorded quite awhile ago :sweat_smile:
Have you considered the Netflix approach, I think you should encourage binge listening for SoftwareUnscripted and drop them all at once :smiley:
I'm totally not biased or anything... I want to listen to them all
Wow Jai and Lean! Awesome :sparkles:
